attributes.action: Stop the closure of Ynyswen Infants School
attributes.additional_details: To stop the closure of Ynyswen Infants School, Ynyswen, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taff, Mid Glamorgan CF42 6YS.  Our School is a small school with a 100 year heritage. We believe small schools to be heart of local communities, essential in the survival of the Welsh traditions, and most importantly, as loving, centres of academic excellence for our children.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and not appropriate for the Wales Office to intervene.
